validation_details.description: Validates proper water table calculation from 3D heads

validation_details.expected: Consistent results with different dry values
validation_details.description: Ensures robust handling of various dry cell conventions

validation_details.expected: Valid numpy array with proper dimensions
validation_details.description: Ensures gradient computation produces valid results

concepts_demonstrated: Water table extraction from complex 3D head distributions
Transmissivity calculation with open interval support
Vertical gradient computation for flow analysis
Saturated thickness determination for unconfined aquifers

technical_achievements.utility_integration: Successfully used all major FloPy post-processing utilities
technical_achievements.boundary_handling: Proper treatment of dry cells and no-flow boundaries
technical_achievements.multi_layer_analysis: Comprehensive analysis of complex aquifer systems
technical_achievements.professional_standards: Met industry requirements for groundwater analysis

professional_applications_covered: Pump test analysis and aquifer characterization
Water table mapping for unconfined aquifer studies
Vertical flow assessment between aquifer layers
Contamination plume analysis and flow pathways
Water supply assessment and yield evaluation

get_water_table.purpose: Extract 2D water table from 3D head arrays

get_transmissivities.purpose: Calculate transmissivity from heads and aquifer properties
